column4: SolarCity recuses two more board members from voting on Tesla offer
column5: Two additional SolarCity Corp board members with ties to Elon Musk are recusing themselves from making decisions regarding Tesla Motors Inc's offer to buy the solar power company  in a bid to alleviate corporate governance concerns surrounding a potential deal.

column4: SolarCity recuses two more board members from voting on Tesla offer
column5: June 25 Two additional SolarCity Corp  board members with ties to Elon Musk are recusing themselves from making decisions regarding Tesla Motors Inc's  offer to buy the solar power company  in a bid to alleviate corporate governance concerns surrounding a potential deal.
